name: ice-punch
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.
short_effect: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

flavor_text.black_white: The target is punched with an icy fist. It may also leave the target frozen.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The target is punched with an icy fist. It may also leave the target frozen.
